block.p: Women's National Basketball Association MINNESOTA LYNX -- Traded G Grace Daley to New York for a 2001 first-round draft pick.
Women's National Basketball Association MINNESOTA LYNX -- Traded G Grace Daley to New York for a 2001 first-round draft pick.
Arena Football League 2 JACKSONVILLE TOMCATS -- Named Ron McCrone coach.
Canadian Football League CALGARY STAMPEDERS -- Traded OT Rohn Meyer to Toronto for a 2001 second-round draft pick.
Xtreme Football League MEMPHIS MANIAX -- Named Kippy Brown coach.

National Hockey League BOSTON BRUINS -- Assigned D Martin Grenier, D Zdenek Kutlak and G Kay Whitmore to Providence of the AHL. Returned LW Kyle Wanvig to his junior team. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS -- Reassigned LW Rick Gorman, LW Jonathan Schill, RW Kent McDonell, D Tim O'Connell, D Robert Eck and D Dan Watson to Syracuse of the AHL. Returned G Shane Bendera to Red Deer of the WHL. MINNESOTA WILD -- Signed F Pascal Dupuis. ST. LOUIS BLUES -- Assigned F Garham Belak, F Marc Brown, F Daniel Corso, F Shawn Mamane, F David Morisset, F Justin Papineau, F Tomaz Razinger, F Tyler Rennette, F Mark Rycroft, F Jamie Thompson, F Andrei Troschinsky, F Roger Trudeau, F Brad Voth, F Tyler Willis, F Andrei Petrakov, D Jan Horacek, D Lauri Kinos, D Dmitri Plekanov, D Peter Smrek, D Didier Tremblay, D Matt Walker, G Cody Rudkowsky and G Curtis Sanford to Worcester of the AHL. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING -- Assigned RW Dmitry Afanasenkov, D Kaspars Astashenko, D Ben Clymer, RW Matt Elich, D Michael Jones, G Dieter Kochan, D Mario Larocque and C Scott Nichol to Detroit of the IHL; C Fedor Fedorov to Sudbury of the OHL; and RW Dan Kesa to Manitoba of the IHL. Released D Dan Keczmer.
International Hockey League CHICAGO WOLVES -- Signed RW Rob Brown.
East Coast Hockey League FLORIDA EVERBLADES -- Agreed to terms with LW Randy Copley. SOUTH CAROLINA STINGRAYS -- Signed D Mike Nicholson.
West Coast Hockey League IDAHO STEELHEADS -- Signed LW Rob Concannon.

LOUISIANA TECH -- Named Lacey Brooks women's tennis coach. MILLIKIN -- Named Michael Anderson sports information director, effective Oct. 2 NEW MEXICO -- Promoted men's assistant bsketball coach Joe Dooley to associate head coach. RAMAPO -- Named Marc Cameron, Sean Drennan, Andy Kronfeld and Bob Biegel men's assistant basketball coaches. WISCONSIN-LACROSSE -- Named David Johnson sports information director.
